overall_objectives: Enhance system capabilities for production deployment, integrate advanced features and monitoring, establish compliance and security frameworks. Achieve Tier 2 success criteria: accuracy >92%, false positive rate <2%, throughput >500K packets/hour, availability 99.5%.

tasks.title: Upgrade to Tier 2 Models and Features
tasks.description: Implement advanced feature engineering (30+ features), ensemble models (RF, XGBoost, Autoencoder), SHAP-based explanations, and ensemble voting with confidence scores. Objectives: Improve detection accuracy and explainability. Dependencies: Completion of Phase 1 MVP. Success metrics: Accuracy >92%, FPR <2%. Practical notes: Use cross-validation, integrate with MLflow for tracking.

tasks.title: Implement Active Learning Foundation
tasks.description: Add feedback loops for continuous model improvement, implement uncertainty sampling and query strategies. Objectives: Enable model adaptation to new data. Dependencies: Upgrade to Tier 2 Models. Success metrics: Active learning pipeline functional. Practical notes: Integrate with data labeling workflows, monitor performance drift.
dependencies: Upgrade to Tier 2 Models and Features

tasks.title: Kubernetes Deployment and Scaling
tasks.description: Migrate from Docker to Kubernetes orchestration, implement auto-scaling, configure service mesh basics. Objectives: Enable production deployment with high availability. Dependencies: Phase 1 Deployment. Success metrics: K8s cluster deployed, auto-scaling tested. Practical notes: Use Helm charts, monitor resource usage.

tasks.title: Advanced Monitoring and Alerting
tasks.description: Set up Prometheus/Grafana stack with comprehensive dashboards, implement automated bias detection and drift monitoring. Objectives: Ensure system reliability and compliance. Dependencies: Kubernetes Deployment. Success metrics: Monitoring alerts functional, MTTD <5 minutes. Practical notes: Include custom metrics for model performance.

tasks.title: SIEM Integration
tasks.description: Develop connectors for Security Information and Event Management systems, implement standardized logging and alerting formats. Objectives: Integrate with enterprise security infrastructure. Dependencies: Advanced Monitoring. Success metrics: SIEM events generated and forwarded. Practical notes: Use APIs or syslog, ensure data privacy compliance.

tasks.title: Compliance Framework Implementation
tasks.description: Establish GDPR/CCPA compliance with audit trails, implement quarterly bias reviews, set up security standards (SOC2, ISO 27001). Objectives: Ensure ethical and legal compliance. Dependencies: Advanced Monitoring. Success metrics: Compliance audit passed. Practical notes: Document procedures, automate audit logging.

tasks.title: A/B Testing Framework
tasks.description: Implement framework for testing model variants, set up statistical significance testing and lift measurement. Objectives: Validate improvements objectively. Dependencies: Upgrade to Tier 2 Models. Success metrics: A/B test completed with >10% lift. Practical notes: Use traffic splitting, monitor for fairness.
dependencies: Upgrade to Tier 2 Models and Features

tasks.title: Comprehensive Evaluation and Optimization
tasks.description: Perform hyperparameter optimization with advanced techniques, implement cross-validation and ensemble methods. Objectives: Maximize model performance. Dependencies: Upgrade to Tier 2 Models. Success metrics: Optimized models with evaluation reports. Practical notes: Use Optuna or Hyperopt, document results.
dependencies: Upgrade to Tier 2 Models and Features

tasks.title: Runbooks and Operational Documentation
tasks.description: Create detailed runbooks for deployment, monitoring, and incident response, update API docs and user guides. Objectives: Enable smooth operations. Dependencies: All Phase 2 tasks. Success metrics: Documentation complete and reviewed. Practical notes: Include troubleshooting guides, team handoff procedures.
